Center for Adaptive Warfighting

Want to work on complex problems that matter at the speed of relevance?


Yes, finally. No, I'm content with the status quo.

Good choice, happy to have you.

World-class instruction in proven business models customized for the warfighter

Warfighter-Centered Design

Basic tools for finding, framing, and co-designing solutions to unspecified and complex problems.

i-Corps Lean Startup Mission Acceleration

Reliable doctrine for identifying problems and users, designing paths forward, ensuring value, and planning in the face of near-complete uncertainty.

Military Scrum Master

Mission and task management tool that adapts its lessons from the software development world to the world of warfighters.
